column1: Little Goat Diner////When we got our food
column2: I was super excited.  My Elvis waffles were awesome
column3: and that peanut butter butter? Amazing.  However
column4: my sister was not quite sure her French toast was cooked thoroughly
column5: so she asked to see her girlfriend's plate of French toast.  Where my sister's toast looked like it had two raw eggs (the whites were still mostly liquid and clear)
column6: her girlfriend's toast was cooked medium-well
column7: which was perfect and tasted great.
